alert.note: Alert for Amite; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Wilkinson and northwestern Amite Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 228 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Centreville, or 21 miles west of Liberty, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to fragile outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gloster and Crosby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to ponding of water on roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for southern Mississippi.
